item.title: Alan Tudyk Says He Got Dropped From ‘I, Robot’ Publicity After Testing Higher Than Will Smith With Test Screening Audiences: ‘I Was Very Upset’
item.description: Alan Tudyk recently appeared on the “Toon’d In with Jim Cummings” podcast and claimed he was dropped from the marketing of 2004’s “I, Robot” after it was discovered

item.title: Alan Tudyk Says He Got Dropped From ‘I, Robot’ Publicity After Testing Higher Than Will Smith With Test Screening Audiences: ‘I Was Very Upset’
item.description: Alan Tudyk recently appeared on the “Toon’d In with Jim Cummings” podcast and claimed he was dropped from the marketing of 2004’s “I, Robot” after it was discovered

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Team Responds to Cancellation: “I Wasn’t Ready”
item.description: Currently airing its fourth season, the sci-fi series’ creatives tell The Hollywood Reporter how it feels to have the show come to an end next month.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Team Responds to Cancellation: “I Wasn’t Ready”
item.description: Currently airing its fourth season, the sci-fi series’ creatives tell The Hollywood Reporter how it feels to have the show come to an end next month.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Canceled Ahead of Season 4 Finale
item.description: The sci-fi comedy starred Alan Tudyk as a crash-landed alien named Harry, and Aug. 8 will mark its series finale.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Canceled Ahead of Season 4 Finale
item.description: The sci-fi comedy starred Alan Tudyk as a crash-landed alien named Harry, and Aug. 8 will mark its series finale.

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Canceled at USA Network Ahead of Season 4 Finale
item.description: “Resident Alien” has been canceled at USA Network, Variety confirms. Three episodes of the show’s fourth season are still set to air. The sci-fi series first debuted in 2021 on Syfy

item.title: ‘Resident Alien’ Canceled at USA Network Ahead of Season 4 Finale
